name: core_simd::vector::Simd::<T, N>::splat::splat_const

core_simd::vector::Simd::<T, N>::from_ar.doc: Converts an array to a SIMD vector.

src:
const fn splat_const<T, const N: usize>(value: T) -> Simd<T, N>
        where
            T: SimdElement,
            LaneCount<N>: SupportedLaneCount,
        {
            Simd::from_array([value; N])
        }
